0.3.1.en: Adapter-Config attributes longitude & latitude is optional now. If no longitude/latitude is set, the adpater is getting the longitude/latitude from ioBroker System-Attributes.

0.3.0.en: Change from Scheduled Adapter to Deamon Adapter (https://github.com/baerengraben/iobroker.swiss-weather-api/issues/11). The query interval can now be configured. The adapter no longer terminates and the first query is made 10s after the adapter is started. Attention: For installing this version, please delete the adapter completely and install it again (no update)

0.2.0.en: Updates in order to commit to iobroker stable

0.1.7.en: Added Icon-Codes -17 to -30 => These are not yet confirmed by srf...

0.1.6.en: Some fixes based on Feedback of forum.iobroker.net

0.1.5.en: Some fixes based on Feedback of forum.iobroker.net

0.1.0.en: Running version. Delivers the complete weather forecast from https://api.srgssr.ch

0.0.2.en: First running version. Reads Current Forecast (https://api.srgssr.ch/forecasts/v1.0/weather/current)

desc.de: Stellt eine Verbindung zur SRF-Wetter-API her (https://developer.srgssr.ch/apis/srf-weather)

desc.pl: Łączy się z SRF Weather API (https://developer.srgssr.ch/apis/srf-weather)
